data.title: About Avalon of Auburn Hills
data.meta_description: Learn what senior living at The Avalon of Auburn Hills is all about. Our team is dedicated to helping you make the most of retirement.
data.text:
We Can’t Wait To Serve You.

The Avalon of Auburn Hills is a Detroit-area senior living community filled with kindred spirits just waiting to welcome you with open arms. Here, you’ll be known by name. From our leadership team to our welcoming front desk staff to our life-enrichment teams to our professional dining servers and housekeepers, our highly qualified, exceptionally warm team of local associates has a real passion for serving seniors whether you live in our assisted living or memory care neighborhoods.

Exclusive Signature Experiences.

Because we are managed by Life Care Services®, our residents have access to a full suite of expertly developed signature experiences. These exclusive experiences cover a full spectrum of care and provide a range of proactive wellness and safety initiatives.

Local Team. Expert Leadership.

Our local team consists of friends and neighbors who know the Auburn Hills, MI area and have been part of the The Avalon community for years. And they are supported by the expertise of one of the most experienced providers of senior living services in the country – Life Care Services®.

Leading The Way.

Life Care Services®, an LCS Company®, leads the way in senior living with over a half century of proven experience. This innovative leadership brings passion and performance through lifestyle-centered services and programs, strong financial stewardship, as well as high-quality health services in communities as unique as those who live in them. To find out more about living at one of our senior living communities, contact us.

Let’s Talk

We’re here to help you discover everything you need to know about The Avalon and Life Care Services®. Simply fill out the form and we’ll be in touch soon!

We can’t wait to meet you!

Call us today: (248) 282-4094
